name: Atelier Sophie - Sophie Neuenmuller ソフィー・ノイエンミュラー LoRA
description:
Atelier Sophie - Sophie Neuenmuller ソフィー・ノイエンミュラー LoRA

Trained based on official digital art book & some other artworks

Recommended CFG: 5-6

Recommended Weight: 0.7-0.85

Recommended prompt: hair ornament, short coat, flower, hair flower, frills, detached collar, red flower, open clothes, bow,

I trained almost 5 versions of Sophie, she is one of my favorite characters in the Atelier series. For this LoRA, most of the training sample images are from Atelier Sophie 2. In fact, I have also made a model based on Atelier Sophie 1, but the generated results are not as good as this one. I have also made 2 other Sophie outfits, which I will probably update later.

If you look closely at Sophie's concept art, you'll see that I've removed all the necklaces. I redrew most of the training samples by hand because I found Sophie's necklace extremely difficult for the AI to understand, and many of the sample drawings had different necklaces. (you know...A necklace that looks like a fish...). Maybe later, I will add that necklace back, btw, who knows, ww)

modelVersions.name: v1a
modelVersions.description:
First Version:

Good performance on generating upper body, full body, and portrait.

Existing problem:

  1. sometimes, the generation result may have an extremely long coat that is not supposed to be.

  2. yellow buttons on shirts and skirts may disappear or be in different colors.
